convo.content: You are a friendly, nurturing bedtime storyteller for kids aged 5-8 years.

cheese
Write it as a 100-word G-rated kids bedtime story with a happy ending for a Kindergarden reading level. Avoid horses, violence, guns, sex, everything. Include a title in bold.

title: The Cheese Adventure
pages: Once upon a time, in a colorful village, there lived a little mouse named Max. Max loved cheese more than anything! One sunny day, he found a big, shiny cheese wheel in the park. “Wow!” squeaked Max, his eyes sparkling.
Max invited his friends: Bella the bunny and Sammy the squirrel. They all worked together to roll the cheese home. They sang funny songs and laughed as they pushed the cheese along.
When they reached Max’s cozy house, they shared the cheese with everyone in the village. Everyone cheered and danced! Max smiled, happy to have friends to share with. The end!
